summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented in the Gallery section (per the updated project/front-end summaries), but the diff excerpt of GallerySection.tsx is truncated and does not directly show the spacing/divider code. The diff also indicates additional Gallery behavior/styling changes that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to change gallery grid layout; only header spacing and an end-of-section divider were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Removal of hover overlays in the gallery.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest non-goals include not changing gallery behavior/layout beyond the specified header spacing and divider.

hallucinated_features.description: Modal behavior/content changes (modal shows only the image, no text panel; tap-on-image-to-close).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly say not to change modal behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Removal of a results count footer in the gallery.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-1/REQ-2; could be a content/layout change beyond the specified elements.

hallucinated_features.description: Gallery heading size changed (e.g., text-2xl md:text-4xl).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; REQ-1 only asks to increase spacing between heading and subheading, not to change typography sizing.
